title: The Wilshire in River Oaks area offers final home opportunities
title_page: The Wilshire in River Oaks area offers final home opportunities
maintext:
Open daily including Sunday, Sept. 9, from noon to 6 p.m., The Wilshire by Pelican Builders is located at 2047 Westcreek.
Listing agent Tina Weinhoffer of Sudhoff Companies said that just a few homes remain and are ready for move-in at this 17-story high-rise that is within walking distance to some of Houstonâ€™s most sought-after shopping, dining and entertainment destinations in the River Oaks area.
Enhanced by amazing views, the versatile floor plans offer features that include open living areas, 10-foot ceilings, and island kitchens with Sub-Zero and Wolf appliances; German SieMatic European cabinetry; and wood, tile, and stone finishes on flooring and counters. Master suites also feature incredible views, a sitting area, luxury bath and a large closet.
Located on the east side of Westcreek between San Felipe and Westheimer, The Wilshire offers residents valet and 24-hour concierge; a resort-style pool with cabanas, indoor lounge spaces with a catering kitchen and AV equipment; a huge fourth-floor lounge, a private dog run, and a state-of-the-art fitness center; and two furnished overnight guest suites for guests of residents.
One of the final available residences is #307, with two bedrooms, two baths, a balcony off the living room and 1,392 square feet. It is priced at $699,000.
Further details
For more information, visit the sales office or www.Sudfhoffco.com.
